meanings.sent1: The police arrested the rapers for their crimes.
meanings.sent2: The community rallied against the rapers to protect their safety.
meanings.sent3: The rapers thought they could get away with their actions, but justice caught up to them.
meanings.sent4: The rapers' actions cut deep into the fabric of society, leaving scars that may never fully heal.
meanings.sent5: The victims bravely stood up against the rapers, refusing to be silenced.

meanings.definition: A tool used for scraping or cutting.
meanings.sent1: The carpenter used the rapers to smooth out the rough edges of the wood.
meanings.sent2: She carefully selected the best rapers for her art project.
meanings.sent3: The rapers in the toolbox were always the first to be used in any project.
meanings.sent4: The rapers sliced through the tough material with ease, showing their sharpness.
meanings.sent5: The old rapers had seen many years of hard work, but they still remained reliable tools.
